import React from 'react' import { SendemailContexte } from './contexte/SendemailContext'; import { useContext } from 'react'; import sendEmail from './sendEmail'; const Form = () => { const {objet, setObjet, firstname, setFirstname, lastname, setLastname, password, setPassword, email, setEmail, message, setMessage, city, setCity, state, setState, zip, setZip } = useContext(SendemailContexte); const onsubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() sendEmail(objet, firstname, lastname, email, password, city, state, zip, message) } return (
setFirstname(e.target.value)}/>

Please fill out this field.

setLastname(e.target.value)} />
setEmail(e.target.value)}/>
setPassword(e.target.value)} />

Make it as long and as crazy as you'd like

setObjet(e.target.value)}/>
setMessage(e.target.value)} />
setCity(e.target.value)}/>
setState(e.target.value)} />
setZip(e.target.value)}/>
) } export default Form
